text: Ani tumacyajavala jevha te loka yetila, je amacya ayatinvara imana rakhatata, tara tyanna sanga, tumacyavara salamati aso tumacya palanakartyane svatahvara daya anivarya karuna ghetali ahe ki tumacyapaiki jyane murkhapanane va'ita krtya kele maga tyanantara ksama yacana keli ani sudharana karuna ghetali tara allaha motha mapha karanara daya karanara ahe
